name: Button't
description:
We screwed up and put the wrong folder in the game download link here is a functional version: https://philippstenger.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Buttont.zip

Your controller friends have discovered a loophole in the defense of the keyboard dominion. This has allowed you to infiltrate their territory. Help the controller resistance and take out as many inputs as possible while avoiding the Ctrl guardians.

Warning: The territory of the keyboard dominion is hostile for the honorable members of the controller court, keep your calm and don't lose your buttons.

Game created by:
Lars Pfeiffer
János Weyhknecht
Thomas Bauer
Marco Serrao
Philipp Stenger
Marvin Spahn
